name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Software Engineer with 8 years of experience in building high-performance solutions predominantly utilizing **Java**, **Kotlin**, **Python**, and **Flutter**. Proficient in leading full-stack development leveraging **React**, **Next.js**, and backend technologies, with a keen focus on scalable architecture and distributed systems. Experienced in cloud deployments with **AWS** and managing container orchestration using **Kubernetes**. I have a solid background in maintaining and optimizing data storage solutions with **PostgreSQL**, **MySQL**, and **MongoDB**.

My strong expertise includes developing and integrating robust RESTful APIs, building CI/CD pipelines for seamless deployments, and employing test automation practices to ensure code quality and reliability. I have effectively mentored junior team members and fostered a communicative environment for technical collaboration. Additionally, I possess a deep understanding of **NLP**, **LLMs**, and tools such as **Langgraph** and **CrewAI** to integrate intelligent features into applications. My commitment to improving processes and leveraging **ELK**, **Prometheus**, and **Sentry** for monitoring enhances the performance and stability of enterprise-grade systems.
